trans-unit.resname: it is bound to leave an indelible mark
trans-unit.source: it is bound to leave an indelible mark
trans-unit.target: elle laisse une marque à jamais

trans-unit.resname: Zamua is a singer, guitarist, and songwriter. He was born in Sardinia to a Sardinian mother and a Burundian father.
trans-unit.source: Zamua is a singer, guitarist, and songwriter. He was born in Sardinia to a Sardinian mother and a Burundian father.
trans-unit.target: Zamua est un chanteur, guitariste et auteur-compositeur né en Sardaigne de mère sarde et de père burundais.

trans-unit.resname: His dream was to become a footballer, but he found himself bedridden after an accident on the football field. During his convalescence, his friend Deodatus Nduwimana taught him how to play the guitar. "I just wanted to learn the Redemption Song, Bob Marley was my hero."
trans-unit.source: His dream was to become a footballer, but he found himself bedridden after an accident on the football field. During his convalescence, his friend Deodatus Nduwimana taught him how to play the guitar. "I just wanted to learn the Redemption Song, Bob Marley was my hero."
trans-unit.target: Son rêve était de devenir footballeur, mais il s'est retrouvé cloué au lit après un accident sur le terrain de football. Pendant sa convalescence, son ami Deodatus Nduwimana lui a appris à jouer de la guitare. "Je voulais juste apprendre Redemption Song, Bob Marley était mon héros".

trans-unit.resname:
"The first time I sang in front of someone, I was seven years old. It was in front of my family. I did something that vaguely sounded like rap music.
There was no rap music being played at home; in fact, I'm still not sure where I got that powerful music from...
My father often listened to jazz radio shows. I recall Louis Armstrong's trumpet playing in the mornings while we ate breakfast, as well as the vocals of Ladysmith Black Mambazo, Tracy Chapman, Luigi Tenco, Lucio Dalla, and Fabrizio De André.
Today, when I listen to the recording of that first so-called performance, I understand that when the music hits, it leaves an indelible mark... "
trans-unit.source:
"The first time I sang in front of someone, I was seven years old. It was in front of my family. I did something that vaguely sounded like rap music.
There was no rap music being played at home; in fact, I'm still not sure where I got that powerful music from...
My father often listened to jazz radio shows. I recall Louis Armstrong's trumpet playing in the mornings while we ate breakfast, as well as the vocals of Ladysmith Black Mambazo, Tracy Chapman, Luigi Tenco, Lucio Dalla, and Fabrizio De André.
Today, when I listen to the recording of that first so-called performance, I understand that when the music hits, it leaves an indelible mark... "
trans-unit.target:
"La première fois que j'ai chanté devant ma famille, j'avais sept ans. J'ai fait quelque chose qui ressamblait vaguement à du rap.
Personne à la maison n'écoutait du rap et je me demande encore où j'avais entendu cette musique si puissante !
Mon père écoutait souvent du jazz sur Radio Rai 3.
Je me souviens de la trompette de Louis Armstrong le matin, pendant que nous prenions le petit-déjeuner. Je me souviens des voix de Ladysmith Black Mambazo, Tracy Chapman, Luigi Tenco, Lucio Dalla et Fabrizio De André.
Aujourd'hui, lorsque j'écoute l'enregistrement de ma première performance, je comprends que lorsque la musique frappe, elle laisse une marque indélébile... "

trans-unit.resname: This sensation endures until one realizes that the greatest way to appreciate music is to create it, to bring it to life...
trans-unit.source: This sensation endures until one realizes that the greatest way to appreciate music is to create it, to bring it to life...
trans-unit.target: Cette sensation reste intacte au fil du temps, jusqu'à ce que vous réalisiez que la meilleure façon de vivre la musique est de la faire, de la voir prendre vie...

trans-unit.source: BIOGRAPHY
trans-unit.target: BIOGRAPHIE

trans-unit.source: LITANIE
trans-unit.target: LITANIE

trans-unit.resname: LITANIE is Zamua's first EP, produced by the young independent label OD MusicLab. His debut mini-album is a unique blend of ecstatic feelings and litanies,making it hard to categorize his art form yet essential to know about.
trans-unit.source: LITANIE is Zamua's first EP, produced by the young independent label OD MusicLab. His debut mini-album is a unique blend of ecstatic feelings and litanies,making it hard to categorize his art form yet essential to know about.
trans-unit.target: LITANIE est le premier EP de Zamua, produit par le jeune label indépendant OD MusicLab. Son premier mini-album offre une immersion musicale atypique entre euphories et litanies, et rend cet artiste inclassable mais indispensable.

trans-unit.resname: BIOGRAPHY
trans-unit.source: BIOGRAPHY
trans-unit.target: BIOGRAPHIE

trans-unit.resname: Zamua is a guitarist, singer, and songwriter. He was born in Sardinia to a Sardinian mother and a Burundian father.
trans-unit.source: Zamua is a guitarist, singer, and songwriter. He was born in Sardinia to a Sardinian mother and a Burundian father.
trans-unit.target: Zamua est un chanteur, guitariste et auteur-compositeur né en Sardaigne de mère sarde et de père burundais.

trans-unit.resname: His interest in singing and playing the guitar began almost by chance, during a long period of convalescence that saw him bedridden. itar began almost by chance, during a long period of convalescence that saw him bedridden. Since then, Zamua has devoted himself to music and literature, establishing a unique and thrilling combination of folk and soul-jazz, on a boundary between analog and electronica. A hybrid outcome in which storytelling and the effectiveness of language are key.
trans-unit.source: His interest in singing and playing the guitar began almost by chance, during a long period of convalescence that saw him bedridden. itar began almost by chance, during a long period of convalescence that saw him bedridden. Since then, Zamua has devoted himself to music and literature, establishing a unique and thrilling combination of folk and soul-jazz, on a boundary between analog and electronica. A hybrid outcome in which storytelling and the effectiveness of language are key.
trans-unit.target: Il s'est rapproché du chant et de la guitare presque par hasard, à l'adolescence, pendant une longue période de convalescence qui l'a vu cloué au lit. Depuis lors, Zamua se consacre à la musique et à l'écriture, développant un mélange personnel et passionnant de folk et de soul-jazz, à la frontière entre analogique et électronique. Un résultat métissé dans lequel la narration et le pouvoir des mots sont essentiels.

trans-unit.resname: Continuous exploration of his various musical styles, including soul, blues, folk, jazz, and reggae.
trans-unit.source: Continuous exploration of his various musical styles, including soul, blues, folk, jazz, and reggae.
trans-unit.target: Une exploration permanente de ses différentes identités musicales, entre soul, blues, folk, jazz et vibrations reggae.

trans-unit.resname: In his hometown, in 1996, he formed his first group Cant'nde Reggae with his friend Mastrone (S. Piras) on vocal and F. Ortu on drums, M.Masala on keyboards, L.Devito on transverse flute, G.Demontis on bass, M.Barubiriza, M. Carroni and P. Musina on backing vocals, AbuMar on percussion and Zamua (guitar and vocals). Cant'ndeReggae lived between cellars and garages, in a context of artistic and creative ferment that gave birth to various groups and musical realities reggae, jazz, rock, punk, ska, rap (Vok Rebelde, Seditio Plebeia, SMP, Menarka, Cosca Smeralda Quartet, Reggae Realidad ...). All were underground realities that expanded through communication, feeding, and stimulating one another. During this time, the nickname Zamua was derived.
trans-unit.source: In his hometown, in 1996, he formed his first group Cant'nde Reggae with his friend Mastrone (S. Piras) on vocal and F. Ortu on drums, M.Masala on keyboards, L.Devito on transverse flute, G.Demontis on bass, M.Barubiriza, M. Carroni and P. Musina on backing vocals, AbuMar on percussion and Zamua (guitar and vocals). Cant'ndeReggae lived between cellars and garages, in a context of artistic and creative ferment that gave birth to various groups and musical realities reggae, jazz, rock, punk, ska, rap (Vok Rebelde, Seditio Plebeia, SMP, Menarka, Cosca Smeralda Quartet, Reggae Realidad ...). All were underground realities that expanded through communication, feeding, and stimulating one another. During this time, the nickname Zamua was derived.
trans-unit.target: En 1996, il a formé avec Mastrone (S. Piras) son premier groupe Cant'nde Reggae (F. Ortu à la batterie, M.Masala aux claviers, L.Devito à la flûte, G.Demontis à la basse, M.Barubiriza, M. Carroni, P.. Musina (chœurs), AbuMar (percussions), Mastrone (voix) et Zamua (guitare et voix), à Nuoro, entre caves et garages, dans un contexte de bouillonnement artistique et créatif qui a vu la formation de divers groupes et réalités musicales reggae, jazz, rock, punk, ska, rap (Vok Rebelde, Seditio Plebeia, SMP, Menarka, Cosca Smeralda Quartet, Reggae Realidad ...). Autant de réalités souterraines qui se sont développées en communiquant les unes avec les autres, en se nourrissant et en se stimulant mutuellement. Le surnom de Zamua est né à cette époque.

trans-unit.resname: Music became part of his life almost as a necessity, the need to build a bridge between his different roots. Zamua, always driven by a deep and intimate search, embarks on a trip with his guitar and his voice.
trans-unit.source: Music became part of his life almost as a necessity, the need to build a bridge between his different roots. Zamua, always driven by a deep and intimate search, embarks on a trip with his guitar and his voice.
trans-unit.target: La musique entre dans sa vie presque comme une nécessité, le besoin de construire un pont entre ses différentes racines. Toujours en quête, Zamua part en voyage en compagnie de sa guitare et de sa voix.

trans-unit.resname:
A unique combination
of folk and soul-jazz
trans-unit.source:
A unique combination
of folk and soul-jazz
trans-unit.target:
Un mélange personnel
entre folk et soul-jazz

trans-unit.resname: He relocated to Naples, enrolled in university, and simultaneously launched the reggae-influenced musical group called Metisse. Zamua continues his melting sound explorations with Metisse (A. Rubano on bass, V. Ciorra on guitar, M. Barubiriza and N. Rubano on backing vocals, D. Leone on drums, E. Capasso on keyboards, R. Crispino on percussion, and Zamua on guitar and vocals). "Metisse," indicates and foreshadows the significance of fusion to his style, as well as the significance of always seeking new methods to combine music and various aesthetic inspirations.
trans-unit.source: He relocated to Naples, enrolled in university, and simultaneously launched the reggae-influenced musical group called Metisse. Zamua continues his melting sound explorations with Metisse (A. Rubano on bass, V. Ciorra on guitar, M. Barubiriza and N. Rubano on backing vocals, D. Leone on drums, E. Capasso on keyboards, R. Crispino on percussion, and Zamua on guitar and vocals). "Metisse," indicates and foreshadows the significance of fusion to his style, as well as the significance of always seeking new methods to combine music and various aesthetic inspirations.
trans-unit.target: Quelques années plus tard il atterrit à Naples, où il commence ses études universitaires et fonde, en parallèle, "Metisse", un projet musical à l'empreinte reggae roots. Avec "Metisse" (A. Rubano à la basse, V. Ciorra à la guitare, M. Barubiriza et N. Rubano aux chœurs, D. Leone à la batterie, E. Capasso aux claviers, R. Crispino aux percussions et Zamua à la guitare et au chant), Zamua poursuit ses expériences sonores avec "Metisse". Le nom même du projet, "Metisse", explique et anticipe l'importance de la fusion dans son esthétique et la nécessité d'une recherche constante de mélanges musicaux et de contaminations multiformes.

trans-unit.resname: In 2003, Zamua began working on a new project called ElephantAndCastle, co-founded with a keyboard player and producer Alessandro Capasso (Collettivo Cerchi e Xhu): ElephantAndCastle"ElephantAndCastle" consists of the following members; (A. Capasso on keyboards, programming and vocals, D. Sorrentino on bass, C. D'Avino on drums, R. Crispino on percussion and Zamua on guitar and vocals). An afro-jazz project, whose real "raison d'être" is the fusion of genres.
trans-unit.source: In 2003, Zamua began working on a new project called ElephantAndCastle, co-founded with a keyboard player and producer Alessandro Capasso (Collettivo Cerchi e Xhu): ElephantAndCastle"ElephantAndCastle" consists of the following members; (A. Capasso on keyboards, programming and vocals, D. Sorrentino on bass, C. D'Avino on drums, R. Crispino on percussion and Zamua on guitar and vocals). An afro-jazz project, whose real "raison d'être" is the fusion of genres.
trans-unit.target: En 2003, Zamua commence à travailler sur un nouveau projet cofondé avec le clavier et producteur Alessandro Capasso (Collettivo Cerchi e Xhu) : ElephantAndCastle (A. Capasso aux claviers, à la programmation D. Sorrentino à la basse, C. D'Avino à la batterie, R. Crispino aux percussions et Zamua à la guitare et au chant). Un projet afro-jazz dont la véritable raison d'être est la fusion des genres.

trans-unit.resname: Zamua's passion for experimentation takes more and more shape and space within his creative and writing process.
trans-unit.source: Zamua's passion for experimentation takes more and more shape and space within his creative and writing process.
trans-unit.target: Le goût de Zamua pour l'expérimentation prend de plus en plus forme et espace dans son processus de création et d'écriture.

trans-unit.resname: After a "brief" interlude of six months each in both Tanzania and Egypt, in 2006 Zamua relocated to Paris, France where he pursued his studies in Sociology of Migration He became interested in international laws related to foreign rights and asylum protection, therefore he began working with organizations that assist asylum seekers in navigating the complex legal and bureaucratic procedures required to obtain refugee status.
trans-unit.source: After a "brief" interlude of six months each in both Tanzania and Egypt, in 2006 Zamua relocated to Paris, France where he pursued his studies in Sociology of Migration He became interested in international laws related to foreign rights and asylum protection, therefore he began working with organizations that assist asylum seekers in navigating the complex legal and bureaucratic procedures required to obtain refugee status.
trans-unit.target:
Après une "brève" parenthèse de 6 mois en Tanzanie et 6 mois en Égypte, en 2006, Zamua se rend à Paris, en France, où il poursuit ses études en sociologie des migrations.
Il s'intéresse au droit des étrangers et de l'asile et commence à travailler avec des associations qui accompagnent les demandeurs d'asile dans les difficiles procédures juridiques et administratives liées à l'obtention du statut de réfugié.

trans-unit.resname: It was in Paris that Zamua's solo project took form.
trans-unit.source: It was in Paris that Zamua's solo project took form.
trans-unit.target: C'est là que le projet solo de Zamua prend forme.

trans-unit.resname: He continued writing and performing live in various cultural spaces, Bars, etc in the French capital. His initiative is fueled by encounters and friendships, which contribute to its development. It was crucial to his journey that he met and collaborated artistically with producer and sound designer Shay Mané, sound engineer Fabrice Ho-Shui-Ling, and photographer and artistic director Chloé Dupeyrat (Acidulée Production) during this period.
trans-unit.source: He continued writing and performing live in various cultural spaces, Bars, etc in the French capital. His initiative is fueled by encounters and friendships, which contribute to its development. It was crucial to his journey that he met and collaborated artistically with producer and sound designer Shay Mané, sound engineer Fabrice Ho-Shui-Ling, and photographer and artistic director Chloé Dupeyrat (Acidulée Production) during this period.
trans-unit.target: Il continue à écrire et à se produire sur scène dans les clubs de la capitale. Les rencontres et les amitiés donnent de l'élan et contribuent à la maturation de son projet. Pendant cette période, la rencontre et la collaboration artistique avec l'artiste et producteur Shay Mané, l'ingénieur du son Fabrice Ho-Shui-Ling et la photographe/directrice artistique Chloé Dupeyrat (Acidulée Production) ont été significatives dans son parcours.

trans-unit.resname:
Identity, migration, racism, the physical and spiritual journey are central issues in his music and source of inspiration, and an essential matter for his work and reflection.
The concept of a spiritual trip, which encompasses the bulk of his compositions, signifies a separation from what is steady and dependable. Without ever stating it explicitly, his songs reveal a complex tale about how people relate to one another and how events impact their emotions and experiences.
trans-unit.source:
Identity, migration, racism, the physical and spiritual journey are central issues in his music and source of inspiration, and an essential matter for his work and reflection.
The concept of a spiritual trip, which encompasses the bulk of his compositions, signifies a separation from what is steady and dependable. Without ever stating it explicitly, his songs reveal a complex tale about how people relate to one another and how events impact their emotions and experiences.
trans-unit.target: L'identité, la migration, le racisme, le voyage physique et spirituel sont des thèmes qui trouvent un large espace dans sa musique, comme source d'inspiration et matériau sur lequel travailler et réfléchir. L'éloignement de ce qui est stable et ferme, le parfum du voyage enveloppent la plupart de ses chansons. Ses textes, sans jamais faire ouvertement référence à l'autobiographie, racontent une histoire complexe de relations humaines et de liens émotionnels entre les choses et les expériences.

trans-unit.resname: As a result, Zamua has met and collaborated with Raffaele Casarano, Flavio Boltro, and Paolo Fresu, among others from the national and international jazz scene.
trans-unit.source: As a result, Zamua has met and collaborated with Raffaele Casarano, Flavio Boltro, and Paolo Fresu, among others from the national and international jazz scene.
trans-unit.target: Il en résulte une musique faite de mélanges et d'ouvertures qui conduisent Zamua à rencontrer et à collaborer avec d'autres artistes de la scène jazz nationale et internationale tels que Raffaele Casarano, Flavio Boltro et Paolo Fresu.

trans-unit.resname: Shay Mané and Fabrice Ho-Shui-Ling, who work for the OD MusicLab record label, assisted him in creating his debut EP, Litanie.
trans-unit.source: Shay Mané and Fabrice Ho-Shui-Ling, who work for the OD MusicLab record label, assisted him in creating his debut EP, Litanie.
trans-unit.target: Le label OD MusicLab (Shay Mané et Fabrice Ho-Shui-Ling) l'a accompagné dans la production de son premier EP intitulé Litanie.

trans-unit.resname:
A borderline
between analogue and electronica.
trans-unit.source:
A borderline
between analogue and electronica.
trans-unit.target:
Une frontière subtile
entre l'analogique et l'électronique.

trans-unit.source: Cookies
trans-unit.target: Cookies

trans-unit.resname: Our website uses cookies :some small text files that are sent to your terminal during your visit.
trans-unit.source: Our website uses cookies :some small text files that are sent to your terminal during your visit.
trans-unit.target: Notre site utilise lescookies : de petits fichiers texte qui sont envoyés à votre terminal lors de votre visite.

trans-unit.resname: These text files are used to make your browsing experience on the site more efficient.
trans-unit.source: These text files are used to make your browsing experience on the site more efficient.
trans-unit.target: Ces fichiers texte sont utilisés pour rendre votre expérience de navigation sur le site plus efficace.

trans-unit.resname: The cookies used are "technical cookies", i.e. they are strictly necessary for the operation of this site. Users' prior consent is not required for the installation and use of technical cookies, as the data managed by the session or navigation cookies are used for the sole purpose of checking and guaranteeing the correct functioning of the service offered or to obtain anonymous statistical information on the use of the website.
trans-unit.source: The cookies used are "technical cookies", i.e. they are strictly necessary for the operation of this site. Users' prior consent is not required for the installation and use of technical cookies, as the data managed by the session or navigation cookies are used for the sole purpose of checking and guaranteeing the correct functioning of the service offered or to obtain anonymous statistical information on the use of the website.
trans-unit.target: Les cookies utilisés sont des "cookies techniques", c'est-à-dire qu'ils sont strictement nécessaires au fonctionnement de ce site. Le consentement préalable des utilisateurs n'est pas requis pour l'installation et l'utilisation des cookies techniques, car les données gérées par les cookies de session ou de navigation sont utilisées dans le seul but de vérifier et de garantir le bon fonctionnement du service offert ou d'obtenir des informations statistiques anonymes sur l'utilisation du site.

trans-unit.resname: Deactivate cookies
trans-unit.source: Deactivate cookies
trans-unit.target: Désactiver cookies

trans-unit.resname: The User can control his or her choices regarding the use of cookies generally through the settings on his or her browser, through which he or she can decide to make the installation of any type of cookie subject to his or her prior consent or to prevent its installation completely. You are invited to visit the section on cookie settings provided by your browser (Google Chrome, Safari, Mozilla Firefox, Internet Explorer).
trans-unit.source: The User can control his or her choices regarding the use of cookies generally through the settings on his or her browser, through which he or she can decide to make the installation of any type of cookie subject to his or her prior consent or to prevent its installation completely. You are invited to visit the section on cookie settings provided by your browser (Google Chrome, Safari, Mozilla Firefox, Internet Explorer).
trans-unit.target: L'Utilisateur peut contrôler ses choix concernant l'utilisation des cookies généralement par le biais des paramètres de son navigateur, grâce auxquels il peut décider de soumettre l'installation de tout type de cookie à son consentement préalable ou d'empêcher complètement son installation. L'Utilisateur est invité à se rendre sur la page de paramétrage des cookies de son navigateur (Google Chrome, Safari, Mozilla Firefox, Internet Explorer).

trans-unit.resname: We consider the protection and respect of your privacy to be of paramount importance. We are therefore committed to respecting the confidentiality of your personal data and to ensuring that they are processed ethically and in full compliance with the regulations in force.
trans-unit.source: We consider the protection and respect of your privacy to be of paramount importance. We are therefore committed to respecting the confidentiality of your personal data and to ensuring that they are processed ethically and in full compliance with the regulations in force.
trans-unit.target: Nous portons une attention majeure à la protecion et au respect de la vie provée de nos utilisateurs. Par conséquent, nous nous engageons à respecter al confidentialité des données personnelles et à garantir un traitement ethique et dans le respect de la loi.

trans-unit.resname: According to current legislation, each user has the right to access, update, rectify, delete and limit the use of their personal data. The user can exercise this right by contacting our service: personal.data@zamuamusic.com
trans-unit.source: According to current legislation, each user has the right to access, update, rectify, delete and limit the use of their personal data. The user can exercise this right by contacting our service: personal.data@zamuamusic.com
trans-unit.target: Conformément à la législation en vigueur, chaque utilisateur dispose d'un droit d'accès, de mise à jour, de rectification, de suppression et de limitation de l'utilisation de ses données personnelles. L'utilisateur peut exercer ce droit en s'adressant à notre service : personal.data@zamuamusic.com

trans-unit.resname:
Music comes from a sense of urgency, from a need to share one's voice, soul, and presence. A means of learning to think critically about what we see and do in the environment in which we live.
Making music focuses on the person who creates, who speaks, and listens; it is the beginning and end of a cyclical path toward self-determination. It is a means of reaching people's emotions, conveying a picture, an idea, or a concept, and giving meaning to the perception of reality.
trans-unit.source:
Music comes from a sense of urgency, from a need to share one's voice, soul, and presence. A means of learning to think critically about what we see and do in the environment in which we live.
Making music focuses on the person who creates, who speaks, and listens; it is the beginning and end of a cyclical path toward self-determination. It is a means of reaching people's emotions, conveying a picture, an idea, or a concept, and giving meaning to the perception of reality.
trans-unit.target:
La musique vient d’une urgence et d’un besoin pressant de partager sa propre voix, son âme, sa propre présence. Un outil pour développer un sens et un regard critique sur notre expérience dans la société dans laquelle nous vivons.
Faire de la musique met l'accent sur la personne qui crée, qui parle et celle qui écoute ; c'est le début et la fin d'un cycle, un chemin vers l'autodétermination. C'est un moyen de toucher le cœur des gens, de communiquer une image, une idée, un concept, de donner un sens à la perception de la réalité.

trans-unit.resname: Music builds connections between the inner and outer worlds. It allows us to put into a delicate shape the inexplicable inner secrets that occasionally manage to escape via the melodies and rhythm.
trans-unit.source: Music builds connections between the inner and outer worlds. It allows us to put into a delicate shape the inexplicable inner secrets that occasionally manage to escape via the melodies and rhythm.
trans-unit.target: La musique crée un pont entre le monde intérieur et le monde extérieur. Elle nous permet de traduire sous une forme sensible les secrets de l'âme, des secrets que nous-mêmes ne pouvons expliquer mais qui parviennent parfois à s'échapper à travers les notes.

trans-unit.resname: "When it comes to music, I go into a tizzy. It's something I've done since I was a youngster. Through music, and particularly through singing, I caninvestigate and reflect on topics that are important to me, such as identity, or rather, our identities, which are fluid, changing, and never the same, in a way that dismantles any concept of a real or imagined line between "us" and "them.
trans-unit.source: "When it comes to music, I go into a tizzy. It's something I've done since I was a youngster. Through music, and particularly through singing, I caninvestigate and reflect on topics that are important to me, such as identity, or rather, our identities, which are fluid, changing, and never the same, in a way that dismantles any concept of a real or imagined line between "us" and "them.
trans-unit.target: "Je vis la musique de manière presque obsessionnelle, je le fais depuis que je suis enfant. À travers la musique, et surtout à travers le chant, je peux entreprendre un parcours de recherche et de réflexion sur des questions qui sont centrales pour moi, comme l'identité, ou plutôt nos identités, qui sont fluides, changeantes, jamais identiques à elles-mêmes, dans un mouvement qui détruit toute idée et forme de frontière physique et imaginaire entre "Nous" et "Eux".

trans-unit.resname: "Music has been and still is, a fundamental element of my existence. There is no musical genre. I start with two instruments, my voice, and the guitar. And then begin developing, creating, and telling stories. The foundation of my musical universes, such as soul, jazz, reggae, and electronic music are all incorporated into my work. I allowed myself to be burdened by this baggage, and as a result, I produced extremely hybrid music"
trans-unit.source: "Music has been and still is, a fundamental element of my existence. There is no musical genre. I start with two instruments, my voice, and the guitar. And then begin developing, creating, and telling stories. The foundation of my musical universes, such as soul, jazz, reggae, and electronic music are all incorporated into my work. I allowed myself to be burdened by this baggage, and as a result, I produced extremely hybrid music"
trans-unit.target: "La musique a été, et est toujours, un élément fondamental de mon existence. Je n'ai pas de genre musical, j’ai mes deux instruments, la voix et la guitare. Et à partir de là, je commence à travailler, à construire, à raconter une histoire. Je cherche à donner forme à une esthétique, la trame d'un voyage à travers mes univers musicaux tels que la soul, le jazz, le reggae, la musique électronique... Je me laisse traverser par ce bagage pour ensuite donner naissance à des morceaux profondément hybrides.”

trans-unit.source: Credits
trans-unit.target: Crédits

trans-unit.resname: In 2003, Zamua began working on a new project called ElephantAndCastle, co-founded with a keyboard player and producer Alessandro Capasso (Collettivo Cerchi e Xhu): ElephantAndCastle. "ElephantAndCastle" consists of the following members; (A. Capasso on keyboards, programming and vocals, D. Sorrentino on bass, C. D'Avino on drums, R. Crispino on percussion and Zamua on guitar and vocals). An afro-jazz project, whose real "raison d'être" is the fusion of genres.
trans-unit.source: In 2003, Zamua began working on a new project called ElephantAndCastle, co-founded with a keyboard player and producer Alessandro Capasso (Collettivo Cerchi e Xhu): ElephantAndCastle. "ElephantAndCastle" consists of the following members; (A. Capasso on keyboards, programming and vocals, D. Sorrentino on bass, C. D'Avino on drums, R. Crispino on percussion and Zamua on guitar and vocals). An afro-jazz project, whose real "raison d'être" is the fusion of genres.
trans-unit.target: En 2003, Zamua commence à travailler sur un nouveau projet cofondé avec le clavier et producteur Alessandro Capasso (Collettivo Cerchi e Xhu) : ElephantAndCastle (A. Capasso aux claviers, à la programmation D. Sorrentino à la basse, C. D'Avino à la batterie, R. Crispino aux percussions et Zamua à la guitare et au chant). Un projet afro-jazz dont la véritable raison d'être est la fusion des genres.

trans-unit.resname: Currently, Zamua lives between France and Italy and he is working on his first album.
